transcript.text:
￼














B2B/Private Store - Pro Plan


Personalizing Store
Website Logo

1 min
purpose this widget allows the admin to manage the logo of their store website configuration to manage website logo of specific stores, navigate to the admin >> store management >> stores >> select store >> actions drop down >> configuration >> website logos to start, from the user type dropdown select the store to add logos for various instances, such as – logo for mobile, favicon, site logo, email logo, logo for studio and studio app logo the system will refer to the logos uploaded from this interface and display them in the front store
Did this page help you?


PREVIOUS
Personalizing Store
